title: VNC protocol unstable
author: ledel037
body_snippet:
When using the VNC protocol, it is very unstable and easily disconnects. However, this does not happen when connecting with a normal VNC client.

## Your Environment
<!--- Include as many relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->
* Version used: v1.76.20
* Operating System and version : windows10 pro x64
VNC Server version: tightvnc-2.8.59

comments.snippet: Hi, due its old code base its toght to support it, so no fixes are planed for this version, could you check NB if its have same behavior for you?

comments.snippet:
So I was looking for a solution to view multiple VNC sessions at the same time, and stumbled across mRemoteNG.  I got everything set up (I have 22 clients to watch) and come to find out it's just tabbed.  Minor disappointment, but still better than what I had (the TightVNC client).  Unfortunately, once I set up all 22 clients in a folder and try to connect to the folder, it opens maybe half of the clients, and I then watch as they drop, one-by-one.
